      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(java.lang.String name,
               int xp,
               double shield,
               double health,
               double damage,
               double cost)
        Constructor for the Pokemon class. preconditions: name != null && xp >= 0 && shield >= 0 && health > 0 && damage >= 0 && cost >= 0
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Pokemon.
        xp - The experience points of the Pokemon.
        shield - The shield of the Pokemon.
        health - The health of the Pokemon.
        damage - The damage of the Pokemon.
        cost - The cost of the Pokemon.
